questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A customer is deploying a WAN with these requirements:

• Routers 1 and 2 must receive only routes 192.168.11.0/24 and 192.168.21.0/24 from the Cisco ACI fabric.
• Reachability to the WAN users must be permitted only for the servers that are located in vrf_prod.

Which settings must be configured to meet these objectives?

choices.B:
Configure the subnets 192.168.11.0/24 and 192.168.21.0/24 as Private to VRF.
Configure the subnet 192.168.31.0/24 as Advertised Externally.
Configure an EPG subnet 0.0.0.0/0 as External Subnets for External EPG.
choices.C:
Configure the subnets 192.168.11.0/24 and 192.168.21.0/24 as Advertised Externally.
Configure the subnet 192.168.31.0/24 as Private to VRF.
Configure an EPG subnet 0.0.0.0/0 as External Subnets for External EPG.
choices.A:
Configure the subnets 192.168.11.0/24 and 192.168.21.0/24 as Private to VRF.
Configure the subnet 192.168.31.0/24 as Advertised Externally.
Configure an EPG subnet 0.0.0.0/0 as Shared Route Control Subnet.
choices.D:
Configure the subnets 192.168.11.0/24 and 192.168.21.0/24 as Advertised Externally.
Configure the subnet 192.168.31.0/24 as Private to VRF.
Configure an EPG subnet 0.0.0.0/0 as Shared Route Control Subnet.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
This configuration aligns with Cisco ACI's route control policies and ensures that only the required subnets are advertised while maintaining secure access control for external connectivity.

questions.question_text: An engineer plans a Cisco ACI firmware upgrade. The ACI fabric consists of three Cisco APIC controllers, two spine switches, and four leaf switches. Two leaf switches have 1-Gb copper ports for bare metal servers, and the other two leaf switches have 10-Gb SFP ports to connect storage. Which set of actions accomplishes an upgrade with minimal disruptions?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
It is not C, because Spines and leaves should be upgraded separately to maintain stability.
It is B:
This method aligns with Cisco ACI best practices, which recommend grouping nodes based on their roles and upgrading them sequentially to maintain redundancy and minimize downtime.

comments.content: why C ? should not be B = separte to 3 different group ?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Vote for C

choices.D:
Upgrade the APIC controllers as a single group by selecting the firmware and choosing Upgrade Now.
Divide the switches into four upgrade groups with one switch per group.
Start the firmware upgrade on each upgrade group in succession until all four are complete.
choices.B:
Upgrade the APIC controllers by initiating the upgrade process that uses the most recent uploaded firmware.
Divide the switches into three upgrade groups: spines, 1-Gb switches, and 10-Gb switches.
Start the firmware upgrade on the spine upgrade group and then proceed with the other two groups.
choices.C:
Upgrade the APIC controllers by selecting the desired firmware and choosing Upgrade Now.
Divide the switches into two upgrade groups with one spine, one 1-Gb switch, and one 10-Gb switch per group.
Start the firmware upgrade on the first upgrade group and when it finishes, start the second upgrade group.
choices.A:
Upgrade the APIC controllers by selecting the desired firmware and choosing Upgrade Now.
Divide the switches into two upgrade groups: spines and leaves.
Start the firmware upgrade on the spine upgrade group and then proceed with the leaf upgrade group.

questions.question_text: A Cisco ACI fabric is integrated with VMware VDS. The fabric must apply a security policy to check the integrity of traffic out of the network adapter. Which action must be taken to drop the packet when the ESXi host discovers a mismatch between the actual source MAC address transmitted by the guest operating system and the effective MAC address of the virtual machine adapter?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
In VMware vSphere Distributed Switch (VDS), the "Reject forged transmits" security policy ensures that packets sent from a virtual machine's network adapter are dropped if the source MAC address in the packet does not match the effective MAC address assigned to the virtual machine's adapter. This feature is used to maintain traffic integrity and prevent spoofing or misconfiguration issues.
When Cisco ACI is integrated with VMware VDS, enabling this policy ensures that traffic leaving the network adapter adheres to the expected MAC address configuration, thereby aligning with the requirement to check traffic integrity and drop mismatched packets.

choices.A: A bounce entry is created by COOP communication instead of data plane learning.
choices.C: Cisco APIC deletes an endpoint after receiving GARP packets from the new leaf.
choices.D: The spine switch pushes all endpoint database entries to all leaf switches.
choices.B: A remote endpoint is created to represent the endpoint on another leaf.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Bounce entries are a temporary mechanism that ensures seamless forwarding during endpoint movement. They differ from remote endpoint entries because they do not rewrite the source VTEP (VXLAN Tunnel Endpoint) IP address when forwarding traffic, allowing for efficient redirection without additional overhead.

questions.question_text: How does Cisco ACI manage the old endpoint information on the original leaf switch after an endpoint moves between two Cisco ACI leaf switches?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
In Cisco ACI, the mgmt0 interface is used for out-of-band (OOB) management, and its IP address must be explicitly assigned through the Node Management Address Policy under the mgmt tenant. When new leaf switches are registered in the fabric, they do not automatically receive an IP address for their mgmt0 interfaces unless they are added to this policy.

Selected Answer: D
Tenants->mgmt->Node Management Addresses->Static Node Management Addresses->Create Static Node Management Addresses. Out-Of-Band Management EPG is assigned here as well.

questions.question_text: An engineer discovered an outage on the mgmt0 port of Leaf113 and Leaf114. Both leaf switches were recently registered in the fabric and have health scores of 100. The engineer discovers there is no IP address assigned to the mgmt0 interface of the switches. Which action resolves the outage?

choices.D: Add Leaf113 and Leaf114 to the node management address policy.
choices.C: Associate the oobbrc-default contract to Leaf113 and Leaf114.
choices.B: Enable Leaf113 and Leaf114 mgmt0 under the leaf switch.
choices.A: Statically bind the mgmt0 interface of Leaf113 and Leaf114 to the oob-default EPG.
